abstract: Leading the antitrust defense for Modelo is Christine Varney, who led the Justice Department’s antitrust unit until July 2011 and is now a partner at Cravath, Swaine & Moore.
snippet: Leading the antitrust defense for Modelo is Christine Varney, who led the Justice Department’s antitrust unit until July 2011 and is now a partner at Cravath, Swaine & Moore.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department’s lawsuit to block Anheuser-Busch InBev‘s $20.1 billion deal to buy control of Grupo Modelo is notable for many reasons.

headline.main: Justice Dept.’s Fight Against Modelo Deal Brings in a Familiar Face

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
